statements: DELETE FROM collaborative_projects WHERE project_name = 'Project A' AND status = 'Inactive';
DELETE FROM collaborative_projects WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE contributor_id = 10 AND project_id = 3;
DELETE FROM contributors WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM project_progress WHERE project_id = 100 AND contributor_id = 1 AND date_completed = '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM contributions WHERE hours_spent > 10 AND contribution_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM task_assignments WHERE task_id = 1 AND player_id = 3;
DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Red Team';
